mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user ( username, passwd_hash, passwd_salt ) VALUES ( #{username}, #{passwordHash}, #{passwordSalt} )
mapper.select: SELECT id, username, passwd_hash, passwd_salt, email, phone, qq, realname, register_time FROM user
SELECT id, username, passwd_hash, passwd_salt, email, phone, qq, realname, register_time FROM user WHERE id = #{id}
SELECT id, username, passwd_hash, passwd_salt, email, phone, qq, realname, register_time FROM user WHERE upper(username) = upper(#{username})

SELECT id, username, passwd_hash, passwd_salt, email, phone, qq, realname, register_time FROM user WHERE id = #{keyword} OR upper(username) LIKE upper(concat('%',#{keyword},'%')) OR upper(email) LIKE upper(concat('%',#{keyword},'%')) OR phone = #{keyword} OR upper(realname) LIKE upper(concat('%',#{keyword},'%'))
